title: The Infomercials That Sold Us
overview: Legendary comedian Dennis Miller introduces us to the colorful characters who made commercials so much fun. It's a nostalgic and poignant look back at the years when infomercials ruled late-night TV. You'll see revealing interviews with infomercial stars like Tony Robbins, Suzanne Somers, Leeza Gibbons, Kevin Harrington, Brooke Burke, Melissa Rivers, Billy Blanks, and even the Shamwow Guy!
